text:
1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Hold the golf club with both hands, palms facing each other.
3. Begin the backswing by rotating your torso and bringing the club behind you.
4. Shift your weight to your back foot as you continue the backswing.
5. Start the downswing by shifting your weight to your front foot and rotating your hips.
6. Keep your arms extended and swing the club down towards the ball.
7. Make contact with the ball, aiming to hit it squarely.
8. Follow through by continuing the swing and allowing the club to finish high over your shoulder.
9. Maintain balance and stability throughout the swing.
10. Repeat the swing for each golf shot.
